 *NOTE: All previous updates and patches are already applied, this repack will be compatible with future GOG updates. Download and install them in the correct order , it'll automatically detect the game and update it .....


Do this for 32bit windows :
Go to: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREGOG.comGames1207665783 and change this two keys to: "BUILD"="15" (from 8) "VER"="2.4.0.15" (from 2.0.0.8)

FOR 64 bit windows:
Go to: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeGOG.comGames1207665783 and change this two keys to: "BUILD"="15" (from 8) "VER"="2.4.0.15" (from 2.0.0.8)

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Uninstall any previous Wasteland 2 GOG release if any on your PC . Make sure its registry key entry is also removed....

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) ,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Latest 'Dotnetframe' is required to run the setup (provided)

After running setup,, specify the install directory ,, install as usual,, at the end of setup directx and visual C++ update will start ,, it'll restart your pc ,, play the game from desktop shortcut using run as administrator....

Always open the game using 'Run as administrator' to avoid any savegame/crash issue, if it still crashes, lower the graphics settings and make sure u meet the system requirements along with updated graphic card drivers for your graphics card ...

If you are still unable to get it working, feel free to drop a private message on my facebook page.
